attributes.action: address the issue in e-petition responses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rarely does the response to a successful e-petition (on this site) address the issue raised.  Quite often the response is nothing more than a government press release on a different matter.

If the responses are not on topic, what is the point of the site?

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
